Class TextfileProducer

  • java.lang.Object

    MessageProducer

    public class TextfileProducer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageProducer
    Is used to make a producer for input from text files. Date: 12/2-19
    Author:
    Mattias Jönsson

      • TextfileProducer

        public TextfileProducer(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Constructs a TextfileProducer-object from data in a text file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file from which the data will be taken from.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Exception thrown if the character encoding is not supported.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception thrown if the the file the program is trying to open do not exists.
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if failed or interrupted I/O operations has occurred.
